vegetables.name: Choy Tham
vegetables.description: Fresh Choy Tham is a popular Asian leafy green known for its tender, crisp texture and mildly sweet flavor. Commonly used in stir-fries, soups, and salads, it is rich in vitamins A, C, and K, as well as dietary fiber and antioxidants, making it a nutritious choice for everyday meals.

vegetables.name: Kai Lan (Chinese Broccoli)
vegetables.description: Kai Lan, also known as Chinese broccoli, features thick stems and glossy green leaves with a slightly bitter taste when cooked. Ideal for stir-fries and steaming, this nutrient-dense vegetable is high in vitamins A, C, and K, calcium, and fiber.

vegetables.name: Hong Kong Kai Lan
vegetables.description: Hong Kong Kai Lan offers a stronger, slightly more bitter flavor compared to regular broccoli. Commonly stir-fried with garlic and ginger or lightly boiled, it is a favorite in Chinese cuisine and a good source of essential vitamins and minerals.

vegetables.name: Green Kale
vegetables.description: Green kale is a nutrient-rich superfood with thick, curly leaves and a robust, earthy flavor. Perfect for salads, smoothies, or cooking, it is packed with vitamins A, B6, C, and K, along with minerals that support immunity, bone health, and overall wellness.

vegetables.name: Red Kale
vegetables.description: Red kale features beautiful deep purple leaves with a mildly sweet flavor. High in antioxidants, vitamins A, C, and K, and essential minerals, it is ideal for salads, smoothies, or cooked dishes, adding both vibrant color and nutrition.

vegetables.name: Tuscan Kale (Dinosaur Kale)
vegetables.description: Tuscan kale, also known as dinosaur kale, has long, textured leaves and a slightly bitter flavor. Its hearty texture makes it excellent for saut√©ing, soups, and stews. This superfood is rich in vitamins A, C, and K and essential minerals.

vegetables.name: Coral Green Lettuce
vegetables.description: Coral green lettuce has soft, curly leaves with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. Perfect for fresh salads and garnishes, it provides vitamins A, C, and K, fiber, and antioxidants while adding vibrant color to your plate.

vegetables.name: Red Coral Lettuce
vegetables.description: Red coral lettuce features tender red-tinged leaves with a mild, refreshing taste. Commonly used in salads, it is rich in vitamins A, C, and K and antioxidants, making it a healthy and visually appealing choice.

vegetables.name: Lettuce Ice Plant
vegetables.description: Ice plant lettuce offers crisp, juicy leaves with a refreshing mild flavor. Ideal for salads and cold dishes, it is low in calories and provides essential vitamins and antioxidants for a healthy diet.

vegetables.name: Iceberg Lettuce
vegetables.description: Iceberg lettuce is known for its crunchy texture and clean, refreshing taste. Popular in salads, sandwiches, and wraps, it adds volume and crunch while providing vitamins A, C, and K.

vegetables.name: Mesclun Mix Lettuce
vegetables.description: Mesclun mix is a premium blend of young, tender salad greens with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. Perfect for fresh salads, this mix is rich in vitamins A, C, and K, fiber, and antioxidants.

vegetables.name: Romaine Lettuce
vegetables.description: Romaine lettuce has long, crisp leaves with a slightly sweet flavor. A staple for Caesar salads, it is high in vitamins A, C, and K and provides a satisfying crunch and nutritional value.

vegetables.name: Baby Romaine Lettuce
vegetables.description: Baby romaine lettuce offers tender, crunchy leaves with a mild flavor. Ideal for salads and wraps, it delivers essential vitamins and fiber in a smaller, more delicate form.

vegetables.name: Nai Pak Choy
vegetables.description: Nai Pak Choy is a mild, tender Chinese cabbage with crisp stems and soft leaves. Commonly used in stir-fries and soups, it is rich in vitamins A, C, and K and cooks quickly while retaining flavor.

vegetables.name: Poh Choy
vegetables.description: Poh Choy is a versatile Chinese leafy vegetable with a mild, slightly sweet taste. Suitable for soups and stir-fries, it provides essential vitamins and fiber for balanced meals.

vegetables.name: Sawi
vegetables.description: Sawi is a popular Asian leafy green with tender leaves and a mild flavor. Frequently used in stir-fries and soups, it is a good source of vitamins A, C, and K and complements a wide range of dishes.

vegetables.name: Hong Kong Choy Sum
vegetables.description: Hong Kong Choy Sum features tender stems and leafy tops with a mildly sweet flavor. Commonly stir-fried or added to soups, it is a nutritious vegetable rich in vitamins and minerals.

vegetables.name: Siew Pak Choy
vegetables.description: Siew Pak Choy has crisp white stems and soft green leaves with a mild, sweet taste. Ideal for stir-fries and soups, it cooks quickly and absorbs flavors well. Rich in vitamins A, C, and K, it is a healthy addition to any meal.

vegetables.name: Hong Kong Siew Pak Choy
vegetables.description: Hong Kong Siew Pak Choy offers extra-tender stems and delicate leaves. Popular in Chinese cooking, it is perfect for soups and light stir-fries and provides essential vitamins.

vegetables.name: Spinach (Bayam)
vegetables.description: Fresh spinach, also known as bayam, has tender dark green leaves and a mild, earthy flavor. Ideal for soups, stir-fries, and smoothies, it is rich in vitamins A, C, and K and antioxidants.

vegetables.name: Tong Ho
vegetables.description: Tong Ho, also known as chrysanthemum greens, has aromatic leaves with a slightly herbal flavor. Commonly used in soups and stir-fries, it adds fragrance and nutrients to meals. Rich in vitamins A, C, and K, it is a healthy addition to any dish.

vegetables.name: Water Spinach (Kangkung)g
vegetables.description: Water spinach, also known as kangkung, features hollow stems and tender leaves with a mild, earthy taste. Widely used in Asian stir-fries, it is rich in vitamins A, C, and K.

vegetables.name: Watercress
vegetables.description: Watercress is a peppery, nutrient-dense leafy green from the Brassicaceae family. Low in calories and high in vitamins A, C, and K, fiber, calcium, and antioxidants, it is excellent for salads and soups.
